condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Development of teacher training materials to support transitioning to Grade 1

description.narrative: In collaboration with the government, UNICEF has supported efforts to improve the quality of services provided to children under five, through the development of a positive behaviour focused training package that will benefit 2,700 early childhood centres across the island and a First 1,000 Days mobile app for parents. A national mapping of services for children born with disabilities was finalized and a national body is in the process of being established to activate a plan to promote Early Years Care and Support. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:07/10/2019

Service Delivery - Early learning - ECD facilitators/teachers who received training with funding provided by UNICEF

actual.value: 2020:Irie Jamaican Toolkit training has begun and all 55 senior officers engaged

baseline.value: standards exist. ECD policy in development

actual.value: 2019:Policy remains with the ECC for final sign off- the board has expired and is awaiting reconstitution by the Minister of Education, Youth and Information
